library("plyr")
library("dplyr")

library("knitr")

```{r}
cbind(
  Name = list.files("essays/", "*.Rmd"),
  ldply(list.files("essays/", "*.Rmd", full.names = TRUE), file.info)
) %>%
  arrange(desc(mtime)) %>%
  select(Name, Size=size, `Last Modified`=mtime) %>%
  kable()
```
